title: 5.1 Build Cycling Power Chart view
description: Create PowerChartView.vue with D3 line chart for power over time. Activity selector dropdown. Show avg/max power, time in zones. Highlight sustained efforts vs sprints.

title: 5.2 Build My Activities List view
description: Create ActivitiesListView.vue with scrollable activity cards. Each card: type icon, title, date, distance, time, elevation, pace. Search bar, filters (date range, sport type, distance sliders).

title: 2.6 Checkpoint: Verify Phase 2 (Data layer working)
description: CHECKPOINT: Run unit tests for fitness model and aggregations. Verify data fetching works. Review changes, commit, close tasks.

title: 1.3 Implement Google Sign-In flow
description: Implement Firebase Google Sign-In matching Android pattern. Store token in localStorage. Add allowed-email check. Create auth store in Pinia.

title: 1.2 Configure Supabase client and environment
description: Set up Supabase client in Vue app, configure env variables for SUPABASE_URL and SUPABASE_ANON_KEY. Create composable for Supabase access.

title: 2.5 Create aggregation utilities
description: Create aggregations.ts with functions: groupByWeek, groupByMonth, calculateWeeklyIntensity, calculateSportBreakdown, calculateStreaks. Include unit tests.

title: Phase 4: Analytics Views (Part 1)
description: Implement Training Log, Weekly Intensity, and Monthly Fitness views with D3 visualizations.

title: 3.2 Set up dashboard routes
description: Configure vue-router with routes: /dashboard (default), /training-log, /power-chart, /weekly-intensity, /monthly-fitness, /activities, /sports, /activity/:id. Add route guards.

title: 6.2 Integrate Leaflet route map
description: Add interactive Leaflet map with polyline from activity. Map controls (zoom, fullscreen, style toggle). Decode summary_polyline. Highlight segments on hover from charts.
close_reason: Phase 5 verified and Leaflet map already implemented with polyline, markers, and routing

title: 2.4 Implement Banister fitness model (isolated module)
description: Create fitnessModel.ts with Banister impulse-response implementation. Calculate daily training load from HR/power. Compute ATL, CTL, TSB. Design for easy replacement. Include unit tests.

title: 1.4 Create Login screen component
description: Build LoginView.vue with Google Sign-In button, loading state, error handling. Style similar to Android LoginScreen. Add route guard for protected routes.

title: 3.1 Create dashboard layout component
description: Create DashboardLayout.vue with sidebar navigation, header with user info/logout, main content area. Make responsive for mobile (collapsible sidebar).

title: Phase 7: Final Polish & Integration
description: Final integration, styling polish, error handling, and deployment preparation.

title: Phase 3: Dashboard Layout & Navigation
description: Create main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, responsive design, and view routing.

title: 6.3 Build elevation profile chart
description: Create D3 elevation profile from altitude stream. Area chart with gradient fill. Show gain/loss. Smooth noise with threshold. Interactive hover synced with map.

title: 1.5 Checkpoint: Verify Phase 1 (Auth flow working)
description: CHECKPOINT: Run quality checks, verify auth flow works end-to-end, review changes with jj diff, commit with jj split, close completed tasks.

title: 6.6 Checkpoint: Verify Phase 6 (Activity details complete)
description: CHECKPOINT: Verify activity details shows all data correctly, map/chart sync works, responsive layout. Review, commit, close tasks.

title: 5.3 Build Sports Breakdown view
description: Create SportsBreakdownView.vue with D3 treemap showing time per sport. Each sport tile expandable with sport-specific stats: Running (best 5k/10k, total km), Cycling (best power, total distance), etc.

title: Phase 6: Activity Details Screen
description: Implement the full Activity Details screen with interactive map, stats grid, and performance charts.

title: 6.1 Build Activity Details header and overview
description: Create ActivityDetailView.vue header: activity type+title, date/time, action buttons (share, edit). Achievement badges. At-a-glance stat grid (distance, duration, pace, elevation, cadence). Tappable tiles.

title: 4.1 Build Training Log view (calendar heatmap)
description: Create TrainingLogView.vue with D3 calendar heatmap. Rolling grid of weeks, dots per day sized/colored by training volume. Show streaks, patterns. Date range selector (3mo/6mo/year).

title: 2.2 Create activities API service
description: Create activitiesService.ts with methods: getActivities(filters), getActivityById(id), getActivityStreams(id, types[]). Use Supabase client. Handle pagination.

title: 2.1 Create TypeScript types for activities and streams
description: Define Activity, ActivityStream, User interfaces matching Supabase schema. Include types for laps, splits, zones, photos. Generate from Supabase if possible.

title: 7.3 Final checkpoint: Full workflow completion
description: FINAL CHECKPOINT: Full end-to-end testing. Run all quality checks. Verify all features work. Document any known issues. Review all changes, commit, push.

title: Phase 5: Analytics Views (Part 2)
description: Implement Cycling Power Chart, My Activities List, and Sports Breakdown views.

title: 7.2 Style consistency pass and responsive polish
description: Ensure consistent styling across all views. Polish responsive breakpoints. Test on mobile/tablet. Add dark mode support if feasible.

title: 6.4 Build performance charts (pace, HR, cadence, power)
description: Create tabbed D3 charts for pace/speed, heart rate, cadence, power (when available). Sync hover with map and elevation. Show averages and zones.

title: 4.3 Build Monthly Fitness view
description: Create MonthlyFitnessView.vue with D3 line chart (orange with area fill). Use Banister model for fitness score. Current score callout. 4-week default, option for up to 2 years.

title: 7.1 Add global error handling and loading states
description: Add ErrorBoundary component, global error toast notifications, skeleton loaders for all views, retry logic for failed API calls.

title: Vue Fitness Dashboard - Complete Implementation
description: Implement Vue.js fitness dashboard with Google auth, multiple analytics views (Training Log, Power Chart, Weekly Intensity, Monthly Fitness, Activities List, Sports Breakdown), and Activity Details screen with interactive maps and D3 charts.

title: 5.4 Checkpoint: Verify Phase 5 (Analytics views part 2)
description: CHECKPOINT: Verify power chart, activities list, sports breakdown all work. Test search/filter in activities. Review, commit, close tasks.
close_reason: Phase 5 verified and Leaflet map already implemented with polyline, markers, and routing

title: 3.4 Checkpoint: Verify Phase 3 (Navigation working)
description: CHECKPOINT: Verify dashboard layout renders, navigation works between views, responsive design functions. Review, commit, close tasks.

title: Phase 1: Project Foundation & Auth
description: Set up Vue project structure, install dependencies, configure Supabase client, and implement Google Sign-In authentication matching the Android app pattern.

title: Phase 2: Data Layer & Core Services
description: Create TypeScript types, API service for fetching activities, and core calculation services (fitness model, aggregations).

title: 3.3 Create reusable chart container component
description: Create ChartContainer.vue wrapper for D3 charts with responsive sizing, loading states, error handling, and consistent styling. Handle SVG resize on window change.

title: 4.4 Checkpoint: Verify Phase 4 (Analytics views part 1)
description: CHECKPOINT: Verify all three analytics views render with real data, charts are responsive, tooltips work. Review, commit, close tasks.

title: 6.5 Add laps and splits display
description: Create collapsible laps/splits tables from activity data. Show per-lap/split stats: time, distance, pace, HR, elevation. Highlight when hovering to show on map.

title: 1.1 Install dependencies (D3, Leaflet, Firebase Auth, vue-router, pinia)
description: Install and configure: d3, leaflet, @vue-leaflet/vue-leaflet, firebase, @types packages. Update vite.config for proper bundling.

title: 4.2 Build Weekly Intensity view
description: Create WeeklyIntensityView.vue with D3 bar/area chart. Show weekly training load aggregated from activities. Highlight build phases, recovery weeks. Tooltips with week details.

title: 2.3 Create Pinia activities store
description: Create useActivitiesStore with state for activities list, current activity, loading states. Actions for fetching, filtering, pagination. Computed getters for derived data.
